intro: Caucalis tenuisecta, commonly known as the slender caucalis, is a flowering plant belonging to the Apiaceae family. It is characterized by its finely divided, feathery leaves that give it a delicate appearance. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in umbels, typical of the carrot family. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in woodland areas. Caucalis tenuisecta is a herbaceous perennial that prefers well-drained soils and moderate temperatures.
